title: 10 Easy Ways to Reset Any Password

steps.title: Navigate to the Google Accounts login page at https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin.
steps.content: Navigate to the Google Accounts login page at https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin .

steps.title: Click on “Need Help?
steps.content: Click on “Need Help? ” below the sign-in section.

steps.title: Select “I don’t know my password.
steps.content: Select “I don’t know my password. ”

steps.title: Enter your Gmail address into the field provided and click on “Continue.
steps.content: Enter your Gmail address into the field provided and click on “Continue. ”

steps.title: Type the characters provided to you on-screen by Google and click “Continue.
steps.content: Type the characters provided to you on-screen by Google and click “Continue. ”

steps.title: Enter the last password you recall using for your Google account.
steps.content: Enter the last password you recall using for your Google account. If you don’t remember any previous passwords, click on “I don’t know.”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to reset your password with Google.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to reset your password with Google. Google may require you to answer a series of security questions to verify your identity; such as your phone number, the name of your first pet, your current address, etc.

steps.title: Enter a new password for your Google account.
steps.content: Enter a new password for your Google account. The password you choose will be applicable for all Google products you use with that particular username. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to the “My Apple ID” home page at https://appleid.apple.com/cgi-bin/WebObjects/MyAppleId.woa/.
steps.content: Navigate to the “My Apple ID” home page at https://appleid.apple.com/cgi-bin/WebObjects/MyAppleId.woa/ .

steps.title: Click on “Reset your password” on the right side of the Web page.
steps.content: Click on “Reset your password” on the right side of the Web page.

steps.title: Enter your Apple ID and click on “Next.
steps.content: Enter your Apple ID and click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Select “Answer security questions” and click on “Next.
steps.content: Select “Answer security questions” and click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Select your birth date and click on “Next.
steps.content: Select your birth date and click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Answer all security questions displayed on-screen.
steps.content: Answer all security questions displayed on-screen. You may be asked to provide the name of your favorite sport, your favorite teacher, etc.

steps.title: Enter a new password and click on “Reset Password.
steps.content: Enter a new password and click on “Reset Password. ” Your password will now be changed. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the Microsoft Live password reset Web page at account.
steps.content: Go to the Microsoft Live password reset Web page at account. live.com/password/reset. Contact your system administrator to reset your password if your computer resides on a domain.

steps.title: Select “I forgot my password” and click on “Next.
steps.content: Select “I forgot my password” and click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Type the username for your Microsoft account and the characters displayed on-screen.
steps.content: Type the username for your Microsoft account and the characters displayed on-screen.

steps.title: Click on “Next.
steps.content: Click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts provided by Microsoft to reset your password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts provided by Microsoft to reset your password. If you still cannot sign in to Windows 8 as a result of having an incorrect password, you will be required to reinstall Windows 8 on your computer. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Insert your password reset disk into the drive of your Windows 7 computer.
steps.content: Insert your password reset disk into the drive of your Windows 7 computer. Contact your system administrator to reset the password if your computer resides on a domain or workgroup. If your Windows 7 computer is not part of a domain or workgroup, and there are no other user accounts, you will be required to reinstall Windows. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click on “Reset password.
steps.content: Click on “Reset password. ” The Password Reset Wizard will display on-screen.

steps.title: Click on “Next” and select the drive into which your password reset disk has been inserted.
steps.content: Click on “Next” and select the drive into which your password reset disk has been inserted.

steps.title: Click on “Next.
steps.content: Click on “Next. ”

steps.title: Enter a new password into the fields provided, as well as a hint that will help you remember your new password.
steps.content: Enter a new password into the fields provided, as well as a hint that will help you remember your new password.

steps.title: Click on “Next” and then on “Finish.
steps.content: Click on “Next” and then on “Finish. ” Your Windows 7 password will now be reset. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Insert the Mac OS X Install disk into your computer.
steps.content: Insert the Mac OS X Install disk into your computer. If your computer is part of a domain, contact your system administrator to reset your password.

steps.title: Restart your computer and hold down the “C” button to launch the Startup Manager.
steps.content: Restart your computer and hold down the “C” button to launch the Startup Manager.

steps.title: Select a language and click on the right arrow button.
steps.content: Select a language and click on the right arrow button.

steps.title: Select “Utilities” menu and click "Terminal".
steps.content: Select “Utilities” menu and click "Terminal".

steps.title: Type "resetpassword" in Terminal.
steps.content: Type "resetpassword" in Terminal. If using Mac OS X v10.3, select “Reset Password” from the “Installer” menu.

steps.title: Click on the Mac OS X disk for which you want to reset your password.
steps.content: Click on the Mac OS X disk for which you want to reset your password.

steps.title: Select the user account for which you want the password reset.
steps.content: Select the user account for which you want the password reset.

steps.title: Enter a new password into the fields provided and click on “Save.
steps.content: Enter a new password into the fields provided and click on “Save. ”

steps.title: Exit the Startup Manager and restart your computer.
steps.content: Exit the Startup Manager and restart your computer. Your Mac OS X password will now be reset. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to the main Facebook login page at https://www.facebook.com.
steps.content: Navigate to the main Facebook login page at https://www.facebook.com .

steps.title: Click on “Forgot Password” located at the top right corner of your Facebook session.
steps.content: Click on “Forgot Password ” located at the top right corner of your Facebook session.

steps.title: Enter the username for your Facebook account and click on “Search.
steps.content: Enter the username for your Facebook account and click on “Search. ”

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to reset your password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to reset your password. Facebook will send you an email that contains a link that will allow you to reset and change your password. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to Twitter’s website at https://twitter.com/.
steps.content: Navigate to Twitter’s website at https://twitter.com/ .

steps.title: Click on “Forgot password?
steps.content: Click on “Forgot password? ” below the sign-in section.

steps.title: Enter your email address or Twitter username and click on “Submit.
steps.content: Enter your email address or Twitter username and click on “Submit. ” Twitter will immediately send you an email that contains a link you can use to reset your password.

steps.title: Open the email from Twitter and click on the password reset link.
steps.content: Open the email from Twitter and click on the password reset link.

steps.title: Enter a new Twitter password.
steps.content: Enter a new Twitter password. Your password will now be reset. [8] X Research source If the password reset link fails to reset your password, repeat the steps to receive a new email. Twitter’s password-reset emails are time-sensitive, and will need to be accessed immediately when resetting your password.

steps.title: Navigate to LinkedIn’s sign-in Web page at https://www.linkedin.com/uas/login.
steps.content: Navigate to LinkedIn’s sign-in Web page at https://www.linkedin.com/uas/login .

steps.title: Click on “Forgot password?
steps.content: Click on “Forgot password? ”

steps.title: Enter the email address you use for LinkedIn and click “Submit Address.
steps.content: Enter the email address you use for LinkedIn and click “Submit Address. ” LinkedIn will send you an email that contains a password reset link.

steps.title: Open the LinkedIn email and click on the password reset link provided.
steps.content: Open the LinkedIn email and click on the password reset link provided.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new LinkedIn password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new LinkedIn password. [9] X Research source Reset your password within one day of receiving the password reset email, since the link will expire after that timeframe.

steps.title: Navigate to Instagram’s login screen at https://instagram.com/accounts/login/#.
steps.content: Navigate to Instagram’s login screen at https://instagram.com/accounts/login/# .

steps.title: Click on “Forgot password?
steps.content: Click on “Forgot password? ”

steps.title: Enter your Instagram username or email address into the field provided.
steps.content: Enter your Instagram username or email address into the field provided.

steps.title: Type the text displayed on-screen and click on “Reset Password.
steps.content: Type the text displayed on-screen and click on “Reset Password. ” Instagram will send you an email that contains a password reset link.

steps.title: Open the Instagram email and click on the password reset link.
steps.content: Open the Instagram email and click on the password reset link.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new password. Your Instagram password will now be reset. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to Pinterest’s login page at https://www.pinterest.com/login/.
steps.content: Navigate to Pinterest’s login page at https://www.pinterest.com/login/ .

steps.title: Click on “Forgot your password?
steps.content: Click on “Forgot your password? ” below the sign-in section.

steps.title: Enter your email address and click on “Reset Password.
steps.content: Enter your email address and click on “Reset Password. ” Pinterest will send you an email that contains a password reset link.

steps.title: Open the Pinterest email and click on the password reset link.
steps.content: Open the Pinterest email and click on the password reset link.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new password.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen prompts to create a new password. Your Pinterest password will now be reset.
